DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess effect glucagon-like peptide-1 cardiac output transpulmonary gradient patient undergo right heart catheterisation clinical reason .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Glucagon-Like Peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) Pulmonary Vascular Resistance ( PVR ) Patients With Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Age 18 Able give inform consent On wait list heart transplant Left Ventricular Dysfunction await catheterisation Nicorandil , glibenclamide , Dipeptidyl Peptidase4 inhibitor , GlucagonLike Peptide1 receptor agonist insulin Women child bear age breast feed woman Cardiac pacemaker implant metallic device Unable give inform consent
